metadata.title: Accountify
metadata.description: Your AI Coach and Accountability Social Network

hero.title: Build
hero.subtitle: Transform your life one habit at a time. Smart tracking, streaks, and personalized recommendations to keep you motivated.

features.title: Everything you need to
features.subtitle: Powerful features in a stunning interface. Simplicity meets power.

ultrafast.title: Ultrafast
ultrafast.description: Built for speed. Log habits in seconds and get back to your goals.

analytics.title: Deep Analytics
analytics.description: Visualize your progress with charts and metrics that keep you motivated.

accountability.title: Group Accountability
accountability.description: Join tribes of winners. Compete, share, and grow together.

privacy.title: Private and Secure
privacy.description: Your data is yours. Enterprise-grade encryption for your privacy.

mobile.title: Mobile First
mobile.description: Designed for your phone. Take your accountability partner everywhere.

reminders.title: Smart Reminders
reminders.description: Intelligent notifications that alert you exactly when you need it.

pricing.title: Choose the Plan that
pricing.subtitle: Start free and scale when you're ready. No commitments.

free.name: Free
free.description: Perfect to start your habit journey.

pro.name: Pro
pro.description: For those serious about their goals.

leader.name: Squad Leader
leader.description: For leaders who inspire their community.

pricing.comingSoon: Open Communities — Coming Soon for Pro and Leader users

cta.title: Start Your Transformation
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of people who are already building better habits.
cta.description: Join thousands of people who are already building better habits with Accountify. No credit card required.

showcase.title: It's that
showcase.subtitle: An intuitive experience designed to keep you focused on what matters: your habits.

1.title: Create your habits
1.subtitle: Define what you want to achieve

onboardingCarousel.title: Discover How It
onboardingCarousel.subtitle: Get to know every step of the Accountify experience.

welcome.title: Welcome to Accountify
welcome.subtitle: Your path to better habits
welcome.description: You are about to transform your life with smart habits, an AI coach, and a supportive community.

dashboard.title: Your Control Center
dashboard.subtitle: Everything at a glance
dashboard.description: See your daily progress, stats, and weekly activity. This is where every day begins.

coach.title: Your AI Coach
coach.subtitle: Personalized routines
coach.description: Describe your goals and the AI Coach will create perfect routines for you. It's like having a personal trainer 24/7.

visual.user: I want to be more productive
visual.ai: I've created a perfect morning routine for you...

calendar.title: Track Your Progress
calendar.subtitle: Don't break the chain
calendar.description: Visualize your consistency with the habit calendar. Every completed day builds your streak.

community.title: Join the Community
community.subtitle: Together we are stronger
community.description: Connect with accountability groups. Share achievements and motivate each other.

footer.tagline: Building better habits, one day at a time.

progress.title: Group Progress
progress.empty: No one has shared habits yet

validation.titleMinChars: Title must be at least 2 characters.

coach.title: AI Coach
coach.subtitle: Your high performance coach
coach.whatToAchieve: What do you want to achieve?
coach.tellMeGoals: Tell me your goals and I will design a personalized High Performance Routine for you.

panel.noHabits: You haven't created any habits yet.

card.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this habit?

routine.noHabits: No habits. Ask the coach to generate new ones.

demo.aiResponse: I created a perfect morning routine for you...

welcome.selectGroup: Select a group from the left panel to start

sidebar.title: Discipline Groups

sidebar.createFirst: Create your first group or join an existing one to start sharing your progress.

chat.beFirst: Be the first to send a message to this group.

dialogs.leaveDesc: You are about to leave "{name}". You can join again with the invite code.
dialogs.deleteDesc: This action cannot be undone. All messages, challenges and members of "{name}" will be removed.

confirm.title: Confirm action?
confirm.promote: Are you sure you want to make {name} an admin?
confirm.demote: Are you sure you want to remove admin permissions from {name}?
confirm.kick: Are you sure you want to kick {name} from the group?

progress.title: Group Progress

invite.title: Invite to Group

challenges.empty: No active challenges at the moment.

join.title: Join a Group
join.description: Enter the invite code shared by an admin.
